title: Dear League of Legends players, stop feeding the fire.
body:
If a team mate is doing bad, there are other ways to tell them, don't be a dick about it, flaming and **being toxic will only make them play worse**.

Same goes for entering champ select with a player who had a bad game in your last match. Saying shit like "Guys chodejuggler26 is really bad and he just fed last game" is just setting them up for a guaranteed bad game.
